title: Printer's Sample Book, 1884
medium: Medium: cardboard, paper,and printed cotton textile samples
inscribed: Front Cover: Book I Pigments Lawns 1884
creditline: Gift of Frederick J. Whitehead from the collection compiled by his father Cornelius Whitehead at the Pacific Print Works of Lawrence, Massachusetts
description: Small book of printed cotton samples with notches down right edge reading Buffs, Browns, Olives, Reds &  Pinks, Blue, Greens, Stones & Slates, Purples.

tombstone.epitaph:
Printer's Sample Book, 1884.
1884. Medium: cardboard, paper,and printed cotton textile samples. Gift of Frederick J. Whitehead from the collection compiled by his father Cornelius Whitehead at the Pacific Print Works of Lawrence, Massachusetts. 1945-55-42.
